ygData.subject: Re: Level 30,35,40,45, and a "power level" comme
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ha.  Again I laugh on your lapel. My introduction to roleplaying was when someone gave me a Dungeons & Dragons basic set at the age of about 30.  I ran the
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:10 PM 7/15/99 -0500, Roop Dirump wrote:
>Heheh, when I was a teenager, and you mentioned roleplaying to an adult they
>either thought it was something you did with your therapist or it meant you
>worshipped satan. Back then, nobody roleplayed but kids (Ya! I was one who
>ran around in a sewer pretending to be a dwarf!), and the adults were the
>clueless kewldudes in their polyester leisure suits.

Ha. Again I laugh on your lapel.

My introduction to roleplaying was when someone gave me a Dungeons &
Dragons basic set at the age of about 30. I ran the module that came in it
for my wife and kids and some of our married friends.

When there was all the flap about D&D and Satan worship, I was one of the
involve, experienced, grown-up voices saying, "Hogwash."

Bob
